text.__SUMMARY__: Rhododendron glanduliferum (大果杜鹃) is a rhododendron species native to  northeastern Yunnan, China, where it grows at altitudes of 2300–2400 meters. It is an evergreen shrub that typically grows to 4 meters in height, with leathery leaves that are oblong-lanceolate to oblanceolate, and 10–19 × 3.8–4.5 cm in size. Flowers are white.
text.References:
Franchet, Bull. Soc. Bot. France. 33: 231. 1886.
